name: Reflektor (Skyldig Studios)
description:
Controls: Arrow keys - movement

Z - Interact with objects

Reflektor is a game about living a natural life when nature becomes unrecognizable. Playing as Corporal Robinson Skinner, a technician on Marine Corps Jupiter Station 11, you become entangled in events you do not entirely understand when you are contracted to maintain a ship that runs dark, without any crew.
